commands.commands: %s, these are all commands on this channel: %s

counters.addDuplicate: %s, Counter does already exist. Use !counter %s + to add.
counters.showCount: %s, The counter %s has a value of %d
counters.updated: %s, The counter %s has been updated and now has a value of %d

commands.credit: %s, our overlay is based on the icon-pack BeautyLine: https://www.gnome-look.org/p/1425426/
commands.donation: %s, you can currently not donate to us, but thank you for the thought <3
commands.github: %s, all of our projects are located here: https://coderoria.com/github

language.noLangGiven: %s, please provide a language to switch to.

shoutout.message: Hey! Consider following {{name}}! Their last stream was {{game}}: www.twitch.tv/{{name}}
shoutout.noGame: Hey! Consider following %s! That channel is amazing

permit.message: %s, you can post links for the next 60s.

setTitle.success: %s, the title has been changed to "%s"
setTitle.noTitle: %s, please provide a title to set.

setGame.success: %s, the game has been set to "%s"

commands.failed: %s sorry, the command failed to execute.

clip.notCreated: There was an error creating the clip.

filters.warning: This is a warning. %s, please stop %s!
